languages.text: {n}Энрих пожимает плечами.{/n} "От громких глоток это поможет, но не от длинных языков. Трепаться все равно будут, просто тише".
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих пожимает плечами.{/n} "От громких глоток это поможет, но не от длинных языков. Трепаться все равно будут, просто тише".

traits.locale_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — maybe a little quieter, though."
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — maybe a little quieter, though."
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."
{n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."

languages.text: {n}Er zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das würde laute Worte verstummen lassen, nicht aber leises Geflüster. Die Leute reden und würden es auch weiterhin tun ... nur etwas leiser vielleicht."
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das würde laute Worte verstummen lassen, nicht aber leises Geflüster. Die Leute reden und würden es auch weiterhin tun ... nur etwas leiser vielleicht."

languages.text: {n}Il hausse les épaules.{/n} « Ça calmerait sans doute les plus forts en gueule, mais certainement pas les racontars. Les gens parlent, et ils continueraient à le faire, encore qu'un peu plus discrètement. »
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il hausse les épaules.{/n} « Ça calmerait sans doute les plus forts en gueule, mais certainement pas les racontars. Les gens parlent, et ils continueraient à le faire, encore qu'un peu plus discrètement. »

languages.text: {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Quizá eso remedie las protestas, pero no los rumores. La gente seguirá hablando, simplemente lo hará con más discreción».
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Quizá eso remedie las protestas, pero no los rumores. La gente seguirá hablando, simplemente lo hará con más discreción».

languages.text: {n}彼は肩をすくめる。{/n}「大口叩きは治るかもしれませんが、口の軽さは無理です。人民は話すものですし、治療したとて話すでしょう…多少声を潜めたとしても」
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は肩をすくめる。{/n}「大口叩きは治るかもしれませんが、口の軽さは無理です。人民は話すものですし、治療したとて話すでしょう…多少声を潜めたとしても」

languages.text: {n}他耸了耸肩。{/n}“这只能会让大家不敢大声讨论。人们还是会说这些话，只不过是小声说而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."

traits.locale_text: {n}他耸了耸肩。{/n}“这只能会让大家不敢大声讨论。人们还是会说这些话，只不过是小声说而已。”

languages.text: {n}Omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Gürültüyü azaltabilir ama fısıltıları sonlandırmaz. İnsanlar sürekli konuşuyor, belki biraz daha kısık sesle konuşurlar ama yine konuşurlar."
languages.original_text: {n}He shrugs.{/n} "It might cure loud mouths, but not loose lips. People talk, and they still would — just maybe a little quieter."
